title: ISic000118. I.Sicily inscription 000118
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) M(anibus)
P(ublius) Acellius
Eyporistus
vix(it) an(nis) LXX

Apparatus criticus

Text of ILTermini; Romano: P. ACEILIVS
3: Romano: LYPORISIVS
4: Romano: VIX . AN . LXXX.

English translation

To the Shades of the Underworld. Publius Acellius Eyporistus lived 70 years.

commentary
